title: why is this HAPPENING2ME
body:
Everytime I fix a error I get a new one now I'm getting LoLPatcherUx caused ACCESS_VIOLATION in module LoLPatcherUx

Write to location 00000000 caused an access violation.
and I'm still getting
C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Networking/ClientServer/RemoteFileServerCommon.cpp(63): Failed to create version number from release listing entry "

replies.body:
It looks like something in your OS could be blocking the patcher from accessing game files.  If the [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide was unsuccessful, please [submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and our tech team can help out.  Attaching the following files to your ticket might also help provide context needed to find out what's going wrong:

[DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)
[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
[Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)
I suggest uninstalling and reinstalling the game completely rather than downloading piece(s) of the game from a 3rd party.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=6gHQAKLO,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-18T12:23:54.213+0000)
>
> I suggest uninstalling and reinstalling the game completely rather than downloading piece(s) of the game from a 3rd party.

that's not doing it  this is the reason 
(  ERROR)[12:06:55.809] RADS::UserKernel::`anonymous-namespace'::ParseVersionFile: Invalid version.
(  ERROR)[12:06:55.809] RADS::UserKernel::Application::SelfUpdate: Failed parse the downloaded version file
and whoever the hell is Jenkins you can kys for making all of theses annoying errors

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) Let us know if this doesn't grant League permission to run efficiently on your machine. 

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg

>
> [Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) Let us know if this doesn't grant League permission to run efficiently on your machine.
